Title: Uncle Carl
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Krista Vernoff, Lisa Morales (story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Lip and Fiona pick up Ian from the psych ward, and he refuses to take his medicine for his bipolar disorder. Fiona's marriage is in jeopardy. Frank plots revenge on Sammi while recovering ...
